Class SectionModifyChoicesView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • cmput301f13t10.view.SectionModifyChoicesView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SectionChoiceDialogFragment.AddChoiceDialogListener, SectionView

    public class SectionModifyChoicesView
extends Activity
implements SectionView, SectionChoiceDialogFragment.AddChoiceDialogListener
    This is the activity that allows a user to change which choices the current section is linked to
    Author:
    Steven Gerdes
